channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 布林肯将在台湾选举前会见中国高级官员
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions.翻译:美国国务院在其官方日程中表示，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯将于周五在华盛顿会见中国高级官员刘建超，此次会谈将在台湾选举前一天进行，此次选举将考验缓解美中紧张局势的努力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于美国对也门的袭击导致油价上涨，亚洲股市持谨慎态度
item.description: Asian shares were cautious on Friday as the escalating conflict in the Red Sea region sent oil prices surging, while slightly higher-than-expected U.S. inflation data did not dent investors' views on early and aggressive rate cuts in the U.S. and Europe.翻译:周五亚洲股市持谨慎态度，因红海地区冲突升级导致油价飙升，而略高于预期的美国通胀数据并未削弱投资者对美国和欧洲提前大幅降息的看法。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 台湾称投票前一天在海峡上空发现更多中国气球
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month.翻译:台湾国防部周五表示，在过去 24 小时内发现了 5 个中国气球飞越台湾海峡，其中一个飞越了台湾岛，这是该部门在过去一个月发现的一系列此类气球中的最新一个。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 物价持续下跌，中国经济面临日益严峻的通货紧缩压力
item.description: China's consumer prices declined for a third month in December while factory-gate prices extended their prolonged slide, highlighting persistent deflationary pressures in an economy struggling to mount a solid recovery.翻译:12月份，中国消费者价格连续第三个月下降，而出厂价格延续了长期下滑趋势，突显出中国经济在努力实现稳健复苏的过程中持续存在通货紧缩压力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉降低部分新款中国 Model 3 和 Model Y 汽车的价格
item.description: The price of Tesla's new China Model 3 dropped to 245,900 yuan, and the price of the Model Y dropped to 258,900 yuan, as of Jan. 12, according to the company's website.翻译:据该公司网站显示，截至1月12日，特斯拉国产新款Model 3售价降至24.59万元，Model Y售价降至25.89万元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 市场评估美国消费者物价指数高于预期，美元持稳
item.description: The dollar held steady against peer currencies on Friday, as investors weighed higher-than-expected U.S. consumer price inflation against market bets that the Federal Reserve will cut rates as soon as March.翻译:周五美元兑其他货币保持稳定，因投资者权衡高于预期的美国消费者价格通胀与市场对美联储最早将于三月降息的押注。
item.author: Brigid Riley

item.title: 外交部长表示，中国对与加拿大接触、会谈持开放态度
item.description: China does not want a continuation of the "current difficult situation" in relations with Canada, China's foreign minister told his Canadian counterpart during a phone call, the Chinese foreign ministry said in a statement late on Thursday.翻译:中国外交部周四晚间在一份声明中表示，中国外交部长在电话中告诉加拿大外长，中国不希望与加拿大的关系继续“当前的困难局面”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘买盘：日经指数兴高采烈，中国通货紧缩
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 外国人 12 月向新兴市场投资组合注入 290 亿美元，2023 年将注入 1,790 亿美元 -IIF
item.description: Foreigners added a net $29 billion into emerging market debt and equity portfolios in December enticed by a view that the U.S. Federal Reserve will soon ease monetary policy, taking the 2023 estimated net inflow near $179 billion, the Institute of International Finance said on Thursday.翻译:国际金融协会周四表示，受美联储将很快放松货币政策的影响，外国人在 12 月向新兴市场债务和股票投资组合净增资 290 亿美元，使 2023 年估计净流入接近 1,790 亿美元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 微软短暂超越苹果成为全球最有价值的公司
item.description: Microsoft on Thursday briefly overtook Apple as the world's most valuable company for the first time since 2021 after the iPhone maker's shares made a weak start to the year on growing concerns over demand.翻译:周四，微软自 2021 年以来首次超越苹果，成为全球市值最高的公司，此前这家 iPhone 制造商的股价因对需求的担忧日益加剧而开局疲软。
item.author: Aditya Soni

item.title: 尽管有哥谭市的报道，Grifols 仍预计中国股权出售仍在继续
item.description: Grifols told investors on Thursday it did not foresee any problem closing its $1.8 billion sale of a stake in Shanghai RAAS, despite a slump in its shares after a Gotham City Research report this week querying the Spanish drugmaker's accounting.翻译:Grifols 周四告诉投资者，预计以 18 亿美元出售上海莱士股份的交易不会出现任何问题，尽管在本周 Gotham City Research 的一份报告质疑这家西班牙制药商的会计后，该公司股价暴跌。
item.author: Joan Faus, Nell Mackenzie

item.title: 中国就芯片制造出口管制和制裁向美国提出担忧
item.description: China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao expressed concern over U.S. curbs preventing third countries from exporting lithography machines to China during a phone call with U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo on Thursday, his ministry said.翻译:中国商务部表示，中国商务部部长王文涛周四在与美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多的电话中对美国阻止第三国向中国出口光刻机的限制措施表示担忧。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 早盘竞价：通胀测试市场论点，比特币获得 ETF 认可
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 德国外长在菲律宾谴责中国在南海的“冒险举动”
item.description: Germany's foreign minister criticised the Chinese coastguard's activities in the South China Sea, including its use of lasers and water cannon, during a visit on Thursday to the Philippines, saying the actions were causing concern in Europe too.翻译:德国外交部长在周四访问菲律宾期间批评了中国海岸警卫队在南海的活动，包括使用激光和高压水枪，称这些行动也引起了欧洲的担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾在关键民意调查前聚焦中国对香港的镇压
item.description: As Taiwan prepares to hold a closely watched election on Saturday, the main political parties have highlighted China's crackdown in Hong Kong and rejected Beijing's model of governance there being applied to the self-ruled island.翻译:随着台湾准备在周六举行备受关注的选举，主要政党强调了中国对香港的镇压，并拒绝将北京的治理模式应用于这个自治岛屿。
item.author: James Pomfret

item.title: 中国海警船进入东海争议海域
item.description: The Chinese coastguard said it patrolled the territorial waters of the Diaoyu Islands on Thursday to conduct "right protection".翻译:中国海警表示，周四在钓鱼岛领海进行巡逻，进行“维权”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 韩国前总理将在四月大选前组建新政党
item.description: A former South Korean prime minister announced on Thursday his plan to launch a new political party in a move that aims to challenge the domination of the two leading parties in parliament in the run-up to an election on April 10.翻译:韩国前总理周四宣布，他计划成立一个新政党，此举旨在在 4 月 10 日选举前夕挑战议会中两个主要政党的统治地位。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 印度大力修建桥梁、公路和铁路，孟买焕然一新
item.description: India's longest bridge, the 22-km (14-mile) Atal Setu linking central Mumbai with a fast-growing commercial hub across the Arabian Sea, will open on Friday in a ceremony by Prime Minister Narenda Modi as a centrepiece of his government's infrastructure drive.翻译:印度最长的桥梁，全长 22 公里（14 英里）的 Atal Setu 大桥将孟买市中心与阿拉伯海对面快速发展的商业中心连接起来，将于周五在纳伦达·莫迪总理的仪式上举行通车仪式，作为政府基础设施建设的核心项目。
item.author: Shilpa Jamkhandikar, Ira Dugal

item.title: 优衣库母公司迅销公司第一季度利润因海外销售强劲而飙升
item.description: Japan's Fast Retailing Co , owner of clothing brand Uniqlo, posted a 25% jump in first quarter operating profit on Thursday fuelled by strong overseas sales as it charts a third-straight year of record earnings.翻译:服装品牌优衣库的所有者日本迅销公司周四公布，在强劲的海外销售推动下，第一季度营业利润增长了 25%，连续第三年创下盈利纪录。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 习近平向艾奥瓦州老朋友表示世界需要中美关系稳定
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping, in a recent reply to a letter from an Iowa native whom he first met nearly four decades ago, said the world's future demanded stability in Sino-U.S. ties, according to Chinese state media on Wednesday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周三报道，中国国家主席习近平最近在回信一位爱荷华州人的来信中表示，世界的未来需要中美关系的稳定。他与爱荷华州人在近四十年前首次会面。
item.author: Ryan Woo
